Donald Rumsfeld 's top regret: not quitting after Abu Ghraib Former US defense secretary Donald Rumsfeld spared no criticism of his colleagues in his new memoir Tuesday, but also admitted in an interview the country would've been better off if he had quit after the 2004 Abu Ghraib scandal.
